text: aur hamane banee israeel ko saagar paar kara diya, to firaun aur usakee sena ne unaka peechha kiya, atyaachaar tatha shatruta ke dhyey se. yahaan tak ki jab vah jalamagan hone laga, to bolaah main eemaan le aaya aur maan liya ki usake siva koee poojy nahin hai, jisapar banee israeel eemaan laaye hain aur main aagyaakaariyon mein hoon
